titleStmt.title: The case of John Dunton, citizen of London with respect to his mother-in-law, Madam Jane Nicholas, of St. Albans, and her only child, Sarah Dunton : with the just reasons for her husband's leaving her : in a letter to his worthy friend, Mr. George Larkin, Senior : to which is added his letter to his wife.
titleStmt.author: Dunton, John, 1659-1733.
Nicholas, Jane, d. 1708.
Larkin, George, Sr.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by A. Baldwin ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
